job.title: Industrial-Organizational Researcher/Statistician
job.description: ltstronggtltugtoverviewltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtwe are not just offering a job but a meaningful career come join our passionate teamltbrgtltbrgtas a fortune company we hire the best employees to serve our customers making us a leader in the insurance and financial services industry state farm embraces diversity and inclusion to ensure a workforce that is engaged builds on the strengths and talents of all associates and creates a good neighbor cultureltbrgtltbrgtwe offer competitive benefits and pay with the potential for an annual financial award based on both individual and enterprise performance our employees have an opportunity to participate in volunteer events within the community and engage in a learning culture we offer programs to assist with tuition reimbursement professional designations employee development wellness initiatives and moreltbrgtltbrgtvisit our careers page for more information on our benefits locations and the process of joining workforce ltligtltligtroutinely engages in quantitative and qualitative research and analysis on many nonstandard and unique business problemsltligtltligtuses knowledge of business areas and research skills to address a diverse range of realworld business issues and to solve business problemsltligtltligtmaintains a high level of expertise in research design and methodologies statistical analyses of project parameters or analysis develops statistical models or analyses as neededltligtltligtassists in developing communications of project findingsltligtltligtindependently extracts and transforms
